text: blood recovery system. After obtained written parental consent, the 20 patients were randomized to 2 groups of 10 patients each, according to whether vancomycin or saline solution (SS) was added to the machine's wash solution. The randomization sequence was generated on the www.randomization.com website using the randomly permuted blocks method.
sentences: After obtained written parental consent, the 20 patients were randomized to 2 groups of 10 patients each, according to whether vancomycin or saline solution (SS) was added to the machine's wash solution.
The randomization sequence was generated on the www.randomization.com website using the randomly permuted blocks method.
